hero.description: Optimize your PDF files directly in your browser. Your documents never leave your device, ensuring maximum privacy and speed.

secure.title: Private & Secure
secure.description: Files are processed locally on your device. We never see, store, or transmit your documents.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: No upload or download times. Compression happens instantly using your browser's power.

quality.title: Quality First
quality.description: Smart compression algorithms reduce file size while maintaining document clarity and readability.

footer.description: Secure, client-side PDF compression tool. Your files never leave your device.

about.title: About GoToDev
about.subtitle: Innovating for Developers
about.description: GoToDev is a startup dedicated to building powerful, accessible solutions. With over 10+ tools and solutions, we empower developers and creators to build better and faster.

tools.toolkit: A comprehensive collection of developer tools and utilities in one place.
tools.converter: Convert images between various formats quickly and efficiently.
tools.remover: Remove backgrounds from images automatically using AI.
tools.blur: Generate beautiful CSS blur effects and glassmorphism styles.

compressor.drop_desc: Upload up to 100 files. We'll compress them securely in your browser.
